languages.text: "Тише, Идира". {n}Абеляр делает шаг, заступая между Тласс и Чордой.{/n} "Я понимаю твой гнев, но, видит Бог-Император, еще одно высказывание... и сама ты отправишься туда же, куда и эти бедолаги".

"Calm yourself, Idira." {n}Abelard steps between the psyker and Chorda.{/n} "I can understand your anger, but by the God-Emperor, another word out of turn... and you will find yourself following those unfortunates."
languages.original_text: "Тише, Идира". {n}Абеляр делает шаг, заступая между Тласс и Чордой.{/n} "Я понимаю твой гнев, но, видит Бог-Император, еще одно высказывание... и сама ты отправишься туда же, куда и эти бедолаги".

traits.locale_text: "Calm down, Idira." {n}Abelard steps between Tlass and Chorda.{/n} "I can understand your anger, but by the God-Emperor, say another thing... and you will follow those unfortunates."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Calm down, Idira." {n}Abelard steps between Tlass and Chorda.{/n} "I can understand your anger, but by the God-Emperor, say another thing... and you will follow those unfortunates."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Calm down, Idira." {n}Abelard steps between Tlass and Chorda.{/n} "I can understand your anger, but by the God-Emperor, say another thing... and you will follow those unfortunates."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Calm down, Idira." {n}Abelard steps between Tlass and Chorda.{/n} "I can understand your anger, but by the God-Emperor, say another thing... and you will follow those unfortunates."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Calm yourself, Idira." {n}Abelard steps between the psyker and Chorda.{/n} "I can understand your anger, but by the God-Emperor, another word out of turn... and you will find yourself following those unfortunates."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Calm yourself, Idira." {n}Abelard steps between the psyker and Chorda.{/n} "I can understand your anger, but by the God-Emperor, another word out of turn... and you will find yourself following those unfortunates."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “冷静点，伊迪拉。”{n}阿贝拉德站在了伊迪拉和库尔达之间。{/n}“我能理解你的愤怒，但神皇在上，再说这样的话……只会让你步上那些不幸之人的后尘。”
languages.original_text: "Calm yourself, Idira." {n}Abelard steps between the psyker and Chorda.{/n} "I can understand your anger, but by the God-Emperor, another word out of turn... and you will find yourself following those unfortunates."

traits.locale_text: “冷静点，伊迪拉。”{n}阿贝拉德站在了伊迪拉和库尔达之间。{/n}“我能理解你的愤怒，但神皇在上，再说这样的话……你只会踏上那些不幸之人的后尘。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「落ち着きなさい、イディラ」{n}アベラルドは異能者とチョーダの間に割り込んだ。{/n}「怒りたくなる気持ちは分かるが、神帝陛下の前では控えるように…その不幸に従うことになる」
languages.original_text: "Calm yourself, Idira." {n}Abelard steps between the psyker and Chorda.{/n} "I can understand your anger, but by the God-Emperor, another word out of turn... and you will find yourself following those unfortunates."

traits.locale_text: 「落ち着きなさい、イディラ」{n}アベラルドは異能者とチョーダの間に割り込んだ。{/n}「怒りたくなる気持ちは分かるが、神帝陛下の前では控えるように…その不幸に従うことになる」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Tranquilícese, Idira». {n}Abelard se abre paso entre la psíquica y Chorda.{/n} «Entiendo que se enfade, pero, por el Dios Emperador, una palabra más fuera de lugar... e irá detrás de esos desdichados».
languages.original_text: "Calm yourself, Idira." {n}Abelard steps between the psyker and Chorda.{/n} "I can understand your anger, but by the God-Emperor, another word out of turn... and you will find yourself following those unfortunates."

traits.locale_text: «Tranquilícese, Idira». {n}Abelard se abre paso entre Tlass y Chorda.{/n} «Entiendo que se enfade, pero, por el Dios Emperador, una palabra más... e irá detrás de esos desdichados».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Beruhigt Euch, Idira." {n}Abelard tritt zwischen die Psionikerin und Chorda.{/n} "Ich kann Euren Ärger verstehen, doch beim Gottimperator, noch ein dreistes Wort ... und Ihr folgt diesen armen Seelen."
languages.original_text: "Calm yourself, Idira." {n}Abelard steps between the psyker and Chorda.{/n} "I can understand your anger, but by the God-Emperor, another word out of turn... and you will find yourself following those unfortunates."

traits.locale_text: "Beruhigt Euch, Idira." {n}Abelard tritt zwischen Tlass und Chorda.{/n} "Ich kann Euren Ärger verstehen, doch beim Gottimperator, noch ein Wort ... und Ihr folgt diesen armen Seelen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Du calme, Idira, {n}dit Abélard en s'interposant entre la psyker et Chorda.{/n} Je comprends votre colère, mais par l'Empereur-Dieu, dites un mot de plus et vous partagerez le sort de ces malheureux. »
languages.original_text: "Calm yourself, Idira." {n}Abelard steps between the psyker and Chorda.{/n} "I can understand your anger, but by the God-Emperor, another word out of turn... and you will find yourself following those unfortunates."

traits.locale_text: « Calmez-vous, Idira, {n}dit Abélard en s'interposant entre Tlass et Chorda.{/n} Je comprends votre colère, mais par l'Empereur-Dieu, si vous dites encore un mot, vous partagerez le sort de ces malheureux. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Sakin ol İdira." {n}Abelard, ruhsezerle Chorda arasına giriyor.{/n} "Öfkeni anlayabiliyorum ancak Tanrı İmparator adına, uygunsuz bir söz daha edersen... Kendini bu bahtsızlarla aynı kaderi paylaşırken bulursun."
languages.original_text: "Calm yourself, Idira." {n}Abelard steps between the psyker and Chorda.{/n} "I can understand your anger, but by the God-Emperor, another word out of turn... and you will find yourself following those unfortunates."

traits.locale_text: "Sakin ol İdira." {n}Abelard, ruhsezerle Chorda'nın arasına giriyor.{/n} "Öfkeni anlayabiliyorum ancak Tanrı İmparator adına, uygunsuz bir söz daha edersen... Kendini bu bahtsızlarla aynı kaderi paylaşırken bulacaksın."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
